home.title: Home Page
home.subtitle: Welcome to the Home Page
home.description: This is a demonstration of internationalization (i18n) in Angular using ngx-translate. You can switch between different languages using the language selector in the navigation bar.

q1.question: What is internationalization?
q1.answer: Internationalization (i18n) is the process of designing and preparing your application to be usable in different languages and regions.

q2.question: How do I change the language?
q2.answer: Use the language selector in the navigation bar to switch between English, German, and Bengali.

q3.question: Is it easy to add new languages?
q3.answer: Yes! Simply create a new JSON file in the assets/i18n folder with your translations.

q4.question: Does it affect performance?
q4.answer: No, ngx-translate is lightweight and efficiently loads only the required language files.
